task.name: Funding Requirements Calculator

llm.i: Calculate funding needed with appropriate buffer
Match funding stage to business stage

task.purpose: Calculate funding requirements based on runway needs, growth plans, and milestone targets. Helps determine how much to raise and how to allocate funds.

inputs.input: Current or projected monthly burn rate
Additional investment for growth beyond baseline

stage.name: pre-seed
stage.milestones: MVP, initial users, proof of concept

stage.name: series-a
stage.milestones: $1M+ ARR, proven unit economics, scalable growth

stage.name: series-b
stage.milestones: Category leadership, geographic expansion, profitability path

step.title: Calculate Base Funding Need
step.formula: Base Need = Monthly Burn × Target Runway - Current Cash

step.title: Add Growth Investment
step.action: If growth investment specified, add to total
step.formula: Total Funding = Funding with Buffer + Growth Investment

step.title: Match to Stage
step.action: Compare to typical amounts for business stage

step.title: Calculate Post-Funding Runway
step.formula: Post-Funding Runway = (Current Cash + Funding) / Projected Burn

step.title: Generate Report
